[00:00.00]Diamonds - Sam Smith
[00:00.21]Lyrics by：Sam Smith/Shellback/Oscar Gorres
[00:00.43]Composed by：Sam Smith/Shellback/Oscar Gorres
[00:00.65]Diamonds diamonds diamonds diamonds
[00:02.75]Diamonds diamonds diamonds diamonds
[00:05.04]Diamonds diamonds diamonds diamonds
[00:07.34]Diamonds diamonds diamonds diamonds
[00:09.28]Have it all rip our memories off the wall
[00:12.53]All the special things I bought
[00:14.78]They mean nothing to me anymore
[00:18.30]But to you they were everything we were
[00:21.66]They meant more than every word
[00:24.07]Now I know just what you love me for mm
[00:28.40]Take all the money you want from me
[00:30.71]Hope you become what you want to be
[00:32.94]Show me how little you care
[00:34.97]How little you care how little you care
[00:37.64]You dream of glitter and gold
[00:39.98]My heart's already been sold
[00:42.23]Show you how little I care
[00:44.05]How littlе I care how little I care
[00:47.40]My diamonds leave with you mmm
[00:49.84]You're never gonna hear my heart break mmm
[00:52.35]Never gonna move in dark ways mmm
[00:54.66]Baby you're so cruel
[00:56.67]My diamonds leave with you mmm
[00:59.14]Material love won't fool me mmm
[01:01.57]When you're not here I can't breathe mmm
[01:03.89]Think I always knew
[01:05.88]My diamonds leave with you
[01:07.47]Diamonds diamonds diamonds diamonds
[01:09.19]Shake it off shake the fear of feeling lost
[01:12.68]Always me that pays the cost
[01:14.80]I should never trust so easily
[01:18.30]You lied to me lie-lied to me
[01:23.14]Then left with my heart 'round your chest mmm
[01:28.39]Take all the money you want from me
[01:30.72]Hope you become what you want to be

data.trans:
[ti:Diamonds]
[ar:Sam Smith]
[al:Diamonds]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.21]//
[00:00.43]//
[00:00.65]钻石 钻石 钻石 钻石
[00:02.75]钻石 钻石 钻石 钻石
[00:05.04]钻石 钻石 钻石 钻石
[00:07.34]钻石 钻石 钻石 钻石
[00:09.28]一点不留 把我们的记忆全都抹除
[00:12.53]我买给你的那些带有特殊意义的东西
[00:14.78]对我来说已经一文不值
[00:18.30]但在你心里 那就代表我们曾经的一切
[00:21.66]它们的价值胜过千言万语
[00:24.07]现在我醒悟过来 你爱我是为了什么
[00:28.40]把你想要的钱全都拿走
[00:30.71]希望你可以如愿成为梦想中的自己
[00:32.94]给我看看你有多不在乎
[00:34.97]你有多不在乎 你有多不在乎
[00:37.64]你梦寐以求的是闪闪发光的钻石黄金
[00:39.98]我的心已经被明码标价卖了出去
[00:42.23]给你看看我有多不在乎
[00:44.05]我有多不在乎 我有多不在乎
[00:47.40]你带着我的钻石离开了我
[00:49.84]你不会听到我的心碎裂的声音
[00:52.35]你永远不会走进绝望的黑暗
[00:54.66]宝贝 你真是狠心
[00:56.67]你带着我的钻石离开了我
[00:59.14]物质的爱情不会蒙蔽我的眼睛
[01:01.57]你不在我身边的时候 我感觉无法呼吸
[01:03.89]我想我一直都对你清楚了解
[01:05.88]你带着我的钻石离开了我
[01:07.47]钻石 钻石 钻石 钻石
[01:09.19]挣脱吧 放下对失落感的恐惧
[01:12.68]付出代价的人总是我
[01:14.80]我绝不能再轻易去相信
[01:18.30]你对我说了谎 你骗了我
[01:23.14]然后带着我的心一起转身离去
[01:28.39]把你想要的钱全都拿走
[01:30.72]希望你可以如愿成为梦想中的自己
